alert.note: Alert for Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 15 at 6:52PM EST until December 16 at 5:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 AM EST FRIDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FRIDAY AFTERNOON... ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. For the Coastal Flood Statement, up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southwest Suffolk County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, from 2 AM to 5 AM EST Friday. For the Coastal Flood Statement, Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. GREAT SOUTH BAY AT LINDENHURST NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 3.1 FT, MODERATE 3.6 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.6 FT, MODERATE 2.1 FT, MAJOR 2.6 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/04 AM 3.0/ 3.5 1.5/ 2.0 2.0/ 2.5 2 MINOR 16/04 PM 2.8/ 3.4 1.4/ 1.9 1.8/ 2.2 1-2 MINOR 17/03 AM 2.0/ 2.5 0.5/ 1.0 1.1/ 1.6 1-2 NONE 17/04 PM 1.6/ 2.0 0.1/ 0.6 0.5/ 1.0 2 NONE 18/05 AM 1.4/ 1.9 -0.2/ 0.3 0.2/ 0.8 2 NONE GREAT SOUTH BAY AT WEST SAYVILLE NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
